key_considerations: Test data management is crucial, requiring valid/invalid accounts, specific phone numbers (e.g., VinaPhone for OTP email advice), and test accounts for social logins.
Testing third-party integrations (Social Logins, OTP provider) requires careful setup and depends on external service availability.
Performance testing requires specific tools (e.g., JMeter, k6) and environment setup.
Security testing needs specialized tools and expertise (e.g., OWASP ZAP, Burp Suite).
Accessibility testing often involves manual checks using assistive technology (screen readers) and validation tools.
Cross-browser and cross-device testing is essential for verifying UI consistency and responsiveness.
Localization testing requires verification of all UI text elements in Vietnamese, Korean, and English.
Ensure server-side validation mirrors client-side validation rules.
CAPTCHA implementation (if added for failed attempts) will require specific test cases, possibly manual.
Session timeout testing requires specific configuration and potentially long-running tests.
